title: A New Standard Of Living! Walk To Rail, Running Paths, Grocery Store
posting_body: Perfectly located at 75 and President George Bush Turnpike, We put you heartbeat of everything that is something.
Nestled within 92,000 square feet of the urban development indulge in shopping, dining, nightlife and entertainment.
Your urban community has all of the modern conveniences of a city within a city.
Grocery store, park, bike share, walk to Dart Rail, running paths, and pedestrian friendly design is all a part of the planned space.
As if that wasn't enough, your home is styled in a modern expression of brilliance with all of the resort like features and amenities you would expect.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locators
